Function reference

Loading

blank()
Make blank images
demo_stim()
Demo Stimuli
read_stim()
Read stimuli
write_stim()
Write tems and images to files

Webmorph.org functions

Functions that link to webmorph.org

avg()
Average Images
continuum()
Continuum
loop()
Loop
symmetrize()
Symmetrise Images
trans()
Transform Images

Delineation

Functions that create or alter delineations

auto_delin()
Auto-Delineation
average_tem()
Average templates
change_lines()
Change the points in a line
draw_tem()
Draw template
fpp_auto_delin()
Face++ Auto-Delineation
squash_tem()
Squash Template Points
subset_tem()
Subset template points
remove_tem()
Remove templates

Plotting

gglabel()
Label with ggplot annotations
label()
Label images
mlabel()
Label with magick annotations
plot_rows()
Plot in rows
plot_stim()
Plot stimuli

Image Manipulation

align()
Align templates and images
animate()
Create an animated gif from a list of stimuli
crop()
Crop images and templates
crop_tem()
Crop to template boundaries and pad
greyscale() grayscale()
Make images greyscale
horiz_eyes()
Make eyes horizontal
image_func()
Apply function to each image
mask()
Mask Images with templates
mask_oval()
Apply an oval mask to images
mirror()
Mirror templates and images
pad()
Pad images
resize()
Resize templates and images
rotate()
Rotate templates and images
to_size()
Resize and crop/pad images to a specified size

Metrics/Info

add_info()
Add Information
get_info()
Get Information
get_point()
Get Point Coordinates
height()
Image heights
image_comp()
Image Comparison
metrics()
Image shape metrics
setnames()
Set stimulus names in a stimlist
width()
Image widths

Helper functions

bounds()
Get template bounds
features()
Feature Points
patch()
Patch colour
quick_delin()
Quickly delineate images
same_tems()
Check All Templates are the Same
social_media_size()
Social Media Image Sizes
subset(<stimlist>)
Subset Stimulus Lists
tem_def()
Get template definition
wm_opts()
Set/get global webmorph options

Geomorph functions

tems_to_array()
Convert stimuli to array for geomorph
write_tps()
Create a TPS file from a stimlist

Utilities

Mainly internally used functions, but might be of interest to some

col2lab()
Color to Lab Conversion
color_conv()
Convert colors
format_size()
Format file size
get_imgs()
Get Images into List
image_func_types()
Possible functions
list_to_tbl()
List format to table format
new_stim()
Make a new stim
new_stimlist()
Make a new stimlist
rotated_size()
Image size after rotation
svgBezier()
Construct Bezier Curves from Template Points
svgControlPoints()
Get Control Points
svgCubicTo()
SVG Path Quadratic Curve
svgLineTo()
SVG Path Line
svgMoveTo()
SVG Path Move
svgQuadraticTo()
SVG Path Quadratic Curve
unique_names()
Get unique names
validate_stimlist()
Validate a list of stimuli

S3 Functions

webmorphR-specific versions of generic functions

`[`(<stimlist>)
Extract stimlist elements
`[[<-`(<stimlist>)
Replace stimlist element
c(<stim>)
Combine stim
c(<stimlist>)
Combine stimlists
plot(<stim>)
Plot stim
plot(<stimlist>)
Plot stimuli
print(<stim>)
Print stim
print(<stimlist>)
Print stimlist
rep(<stim>)
Repeat stim in a list
rep(<stimlist>)
Repeat stim in a list
